author: cnbc.com
title: Matt Young, COO of All Star, Joins The National Association of Locum Tenens Organizations (NALTO) Board of Directors
text:
DEERFIELD BEACH, Fla., March 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The National Association of Locum Tenens Organizations (NALTO) has announced the appointment of Matt Young, Chief Operating Officer of All Star Recruiting Strategic Healthcare Staffing, to its Board of Directors. During Young's more than 14-year career in the locum tenens space, he has touched every aspect of the business, from hiring and training, to operations and information technology, to sales and executive leadership.
"I consider it a privilege to work alongside industry leaders on the Board of Directors and with all NALTO members to support the ongoing development and maintenance of the integrity of the locum tenens industry," said Young.
In 2011, Young joined All Star as the company launched its locum tenens division. Since then, All Star has grown at an unprecedented rate, becoming one of the fastest-growing locum tenens organizations.
Prior to joining All Star, Young partnered with a physician to start up a locum tenens staffing business, Onyx MD Locum Tenens Staffing, in Denver, Colorado. Until 2010, Young served as Director of Operations for this new enterprise, developing and expanding the organization.
Young has served on both the Ethics and Membership Committees for NALTO and has spoken on critical industry topics at numerous conferences.
About NALTO
Formed in 2001, NALTO primarily serves to educate the healthcare industry on the benefits of locum tenens staffing and to establish a set of service standards among locum tenens companies. The association also provides a system for sharing resources among member organizations, offers a formal dispute resolution process through an arbitration committee, and aids all members in cultivating market growth.
About All Star Recruiting Strategic Healthcare Staffing
All Star, headquartered in Deerfield Beach, Florida, has been providing strategic staffing solutions to hospitals, physician groups, and practice management organizations since 2003. All Star takes great pride in their "ASRCARES" culture, offering professional and reliable placement services to physicians, physician assistants, and nurse practitioners in all medical and surgical specialties.
